body:
Features and Enhancements

Components
  • Enhancements
    • Manage Users:
      • The manage user’s grid now includes capabilities to sort and filter based on the display name, username, client identifier, status, and role.
      • Additionally, the role information has been added to the Manage Users export.
    • Homepage:
      • Corrected a rare instance where the sub-menu on the home page was greyed out. Corrected an issue related to viewing detail lists of Core Providers and New Core Providers.
      • Updated the mobile compatible "Hamburger” menu.
    • Assigning access to Insights:
      • Now, for clients who have the new Insights feature in Network360 enabled, their Client Administrators can assign this feature to their users.
        • Note: This feature is ONLY available to clients that subscribe to the Insights dashboard within Network360. To subscribe for this feature, please contact Insights@zelis.com
    • Create a Directory:
      • Corrected error that occurred when the Network Alias did not correlate correctly with the Network Name.
